about_the_game:
🎮 Get ready to rock the puzzle world with Don Dim Dum - the exciting new game from Super Serious Studio! 🧩 Join Don, a grumpy old man on a thrilling adventure through challenging mazes, where the objective is to reach the goal and advance to the next level. But be warned, Don can't stop moving on his own, so it's up to you to help him reach the goal using an environment filled with
👉obstacles
👉breakables
👉rotators
👉teleporters
👉and more.
With each level presenting a unique challenge, you'll need to think outside the box (or not) to help Don beat each maze.

Din Dom Dum features:
🔹 Over 250 levels that gradually increase in difficulty and complexity
🔹 Intuitive gameplay mechanics that are easy to learn but challenging to master
🔹 A unique puzzle-solving experience that requires creativity and critical thinking

Wishlist now and be the first to play this innovative new game, coming soon to Steam!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs

name: Don Dim Dum Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Don Dim Dum is a brain-teaser, move Don one step at a time and he will move until stopped. Challenge your mind with this labyrinth-like puzzle game!
